page.title: 12News of the Week
page.content: We have talked to Claire Chamberlin the journalist who writes about Oundle for the Peterborough Standard. The main news was that there had been a fire at the Turkey Farm at Barnwell and 2,OOO turkeys had to be moved. They were worth a lot of money and people risked their lives to save them. We also talked about the County Council Elections, the Conservative Party got the most votes. The same week Oundle Middle School won a prize for the best Maths Game. We found that the Standard gets their news from people like the Fire Station, Police, Hospital etc. They do this by phoning them up and asking them if there is any news. Sometimes people ring up and tell them news, such as Oundle School, the Courts and the Police.
